html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00962025-02-14TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Security Regulations (Various Amendments, 2023)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS (VARIOUS AMENDMENTS, 2023) in order to (1) update and clarify existing provisions, remove redundancies and outdated references; (2) reduce the retention period for pilot-in-command and second-in-command records for 702 and 705 commercial operators; (3) reduce the time required for a civil aviation medical exam for student pilots seeking a permit in cases where a category 4 medical exam will suffice; (4) harmonize terminology with terminology used by the International Civil Aviation Organization; and (5) increase certainty and predictability for stakeholders by codifying certain temporary exemptions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0026 Publication Date: 2025-02-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS (VARIOUS AMENDMENTS, 2023) in order to (1) update and clarify existing provisions, remove redundancies and outdated references; (2) reduce the retention period for pilot-in-command and second-in-command records for 702 and 705 commercial operators; (3) reduce the time required for a civil aviation medical exam for student pilots seeking a permit in cases where a category 4 medical exam will suffice; (4) harmonize terminology with terminology used by the International Civil Aviation Organization; and (5) increase certainty and predictability for stakeholders by codifying certain temporary exemptions.
